page.title: 11Jet planes over the Lune.
page.content: The Lune valley is used by the R.A.F for training and low flying below the radar screen. The red and white Hawk trainers have young pilots learning navigational and flying skills. The fast jets usually come very fast with no warning,red and yellow lights flashing. They startle us and disturb our work. When we are outside the noise is terrific and we imagine they are attacking us. Conversation is hard. Sometimes two or three fly together but generally they come over in a single run down the valley. There are times when they do this at night. We regularly see Tornadoes,Phantoms and Strike masters. The noise certainly shatters the quiet in the countryside but doesn't seem to disturb the cows and sheep. However we don't like it!
